item.description: Nunez hits double as Liverpool cruise to victory CNN. com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of the U. S. for next week. Visit CNN. com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots. We will feature a selection of the best shots from across the globe. Read More

item.title: YouTuber Paul to fight ex-champion Tyson
item.description: YouTuber Paul to fight ex-champion Tyson It is unclear if it will be an official fight or an exhibition bout. It will be staged in Texas and broadcast live on streaming platform Netflix. Paul, 27, beat Ryan Bourland in his 10th professional fight last Saturday. Tyson’s professional career ended in 2005 and he will turn 58 three weeks before facing Paul. Tyson was the first heavyweight boxer to simultaneously hold the WBA, WBC and IBF titles in 1987.
